def_cn: （基督教1月6日为纪念贤士朝拜基督的）主显节，显现节
def_en: Epiphany is a Christian festival on the 6th of January which celebrates the arrival of the wise men who came to see Jesus Christ soon after he was born.
An epiphany is a moment of sudden insight or understanding.
